item.title: [圖] 微軟發佈 2023 款「醜毛衣」Windows Ugly Sweater
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，在西方假日季臨近之際，微軟按照傳統推出了 2023 年的 「Windows 醜陋毛衣」(Windows Ugly Sweater)。微軟沒有停止懷舊，這次在毛衣上印上了經典的 Windows XP 默認的 Bliss 壁紙。過去幾年，微軟還曾在醜陋毛衣上印製 Windows 95、掃雷遊戲、微軟畫圖（MS Paint）和 Clippy（大眼夾/回形針）等形象。消費者可通過 windowsuglysweater.com 網站購買 「醜陋毛衣」，微軟將把銷售所得的 10 萬美元捐給大自然保護協會（The Nature Conservancy）。

As the Western holiday season approaches, Microsoft has traditionally released the 「Windows Ugly Sweater」 for 2023. Microsoft continues its nostalgia by printing the classic Windows XP default Bliss wallpaper on the sweater. In recent years, Microsoft has also printed Windows 95, Minesweeper game, MS Paint, and Clippy (the paperclip) images on ugly sweaters. Consumers can purchase the 「ugly sweater」 through the website windowsuglysweater.com, and Microsoft will donate $100,000 of sales proceeds to The Nature Conservancy (TNC).

item.title: 字節跳動打造爆款遊戲的計劃落空了
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，消息人士稱，字節跳動的遊戲部門朝夕光年日前大舉裁員，其幕後是創始人張一鳴和董事會主席梁汝波等高管不滿意其表現。因為該部門一直未能開發出在全球大熱的遊戲，其遊戲產品亦難以留住玩家。字節跳動近年來在遊戲上投入了數十億美元，並收購了熱門遊戲開發商，但收效甚微。收縮遊戲部門是字節跳動精簡業務並專注核心業務計劃中的一環。本月，字節跳動還裁減了 VR 頭戴設備業務 Pico 的團隊。

據悉，字節跳動正轉而專注 TikTok、抖音和電商等核心業務領域。最近 TikTok 正試圖在美國複製直播帶貨模式，以挑戰亞馬遜、Temu 和希音 (Shein) 等對手。今年上半年，該公司的收入同比增長約 37%，逾 530 億美元。字節跳動希望藉助調整保持增長勢頭。

Insiders say that ByteDance’s gaming division recently carried out massive layoffs, driven by dissatisfaction from founder Zhang Yiming and Chairman of the Board Liang Rubo, among other executives. The division has been unable to develop globally popular games and its game products have struggled to retain players. In recent years, ByteDance has invested billions of dollars in gaming and acquired popular game developers, but with little success.

The contraction of the gaming division is part of ByteDance’s plan to streamline its business and focus on core operations. This month, ByteDance also downsized the team at Pico, a VR headset business. The company will now concentrate on core businesses such as TikTok, Douyin (the Chinese version of TikTok), and e-commerce. Recently, TikTok has been attempting to replicate the live-streaming shopping model in the United States to challenge competitors like Amazon, Temu, and Shein.

ByteDance hopes to maintain its growth momentum through strategic adjustments. In the first half of this year alone, the company’s revenue increased by approximately 37% compared to last year, surpassing $53 billion USD.

item.title: Instagram 推送了數量驚人的不雅短視頻
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，華爾街日報的一項測試顯示，Meta 旗下社交媒體 Instagram 的 Reels 視頻服務向該媒體建立的測試賬號推送了數量驚人的不雅內容。這包括兒童不雅視頻和露骨的成人色情視頻，以及一些美國大品牌的廣告。該媒體還觀察到，在青少年網紅賬户的成千上萬名粉絲中，經常包含有大量成年男性，後者也表現出對兒童和成人性內容的興趣。兒童保護組織加拿大兒童保護中心 (Canadian Centre for Child Protection) 進行的測試也得出了類似的結果。

Meta 發言人迴應稱，《華爾街日報》的測試並不代表數十億用户所看到的內容。對於為什麼算法會將顯示兒童、性和廣告的不同視頻編排在一起，該公司不予置評，Instagram 每個月都會對 400 萬個涉嫌違反其標準的視頻進行刪除或限流。

Instagram Reels 短視頻的廣告主包括 Match、Bumble、迪士尼、沃爾瑪、Hims、必勝客等知名公司，這些公司要麼對 Meta 的迴應表示不滿，要麼不予置評。可以肯定的是，這些知名品牌都不希望在不當內容旁投放廣告，因為這有損其品牌形象。

A test conducted by The Wall Street Journal revealed that Meta’s social media platform, Instagram, pushed an alarming amount of explicit content to a test account created by the media outlet. This included inappropriate videos involving children, explicit adult content, as well as advertisements from some major American brands. The media outlet also observed that among the tens of thousands of followers of teenage influencer accounts, there was a significant presence of adult males who displayed an interest in both child and adult sexual content. Similar results were obtained in tests conducted by the Canadian Centre for Child Protection.

A spokesperson for Meta responded by stating that The Wall Street Journal’s test does not represent the content seen by billions of users. The company refrained from commenting on why the algorithm would group together different videos featuring children, sex, and advertisements. Instagram removes or limits the visibility of around 4 million videos each month that are suspected of violating its standards.

Prominent companies such as Match, Bumble, Disney, Walmart, Hims, and Pizza Hut advertise on Instagram’s Reels short video feature, and they either expressed dissatisfaction with Meta’s response or refrained from commenting. It is evident that these well-known brands do not want their advertisements to appear alongside inappropriate content as it would harm their brand image.

item.title: 中國市場對蘋果 iPhone 15 的需求依然強勁
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，Wedbush 分析師 Dan Ives 稱，蘋果公司新發布的 iPhone 15 在節日季需求強勁。該機構調查顯示，在進入重要的節日季之際，蘋果公司的 iPhone 15 需求仍然非常堅挺，尤其是在中國地區。沒有看到亞洲市場對 iPhone 機型的需求有任何重大的負面修正，這説明瞭 iPhone 15 的消費需求環境非常穩定。這位分析師估計，僅中國就有超過 1 億部 iPhone 處於 「升級機會的窗口期」。

[The demand for Apple’s iPhone 15 in the Chinese market remains strong] Wedbush analyst Dan Ives said that the newly released iPhone 15 by Apple has strong demand during the holiday season. The survey conducted by this institution shows that the demand for iPhone 15 from Apple remains very robust, especially in China, as it enters an important holiday season. There have been no significant negative revisions to the demand for iPhone models in Asian markets, indicating a stable consumer demand environment for iPhone 15. This analyst estimates that there are over 100 million iPhones in China alone in a 「window of opportunity」 for upgrades.

item.title: [下載] 精簡版系統 tiny11 2311 發佈：基於 Win11 23H2 製作
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，Win11 第三方精簡版系統 tiny11 迎來更新，開發者 @NTDEV 現在基於 Windows 11 23H2 製作了新版本 tiny11 2311。tiny11 2311 包含了 Win11 23H2 的所有新功能，包括 Copilot、RAR 解壓縮支持、重新設計的音量滑塊、設置應用中的 RGB 控制等。與老版本相比，tiny11 2311 的體積縮小了 20%。並且可以接收微軟官方的服務更新。該版本沒有預裝 Edge 瀏覽器，刪除了 Xbox 相關功能（從微軟商店下載遊戲後會恢復）。

  • 讀者可從 Internet Archive 下載 tiny11 2311
  • 網盤下載：請點此關注公眾號 「軟餐」，發送口令 139081獲取下載鏈接。

[[Download] Simplified version system tiny11 2311 released: Based on Win11 23H2 production] The third-party lightweight version of Win11, tiny11, has received an update. Developer @NTDEV has now created a new version, tiny11 2311, based on Windows 11 23H2. Tiny11 2311 includes all the new features of Win11 23H2, including Copilot, RAR decompression support, redesigned volume slider, and RGB control in the Settings app. Compared to the previous version, tiny11 2311 has reduced its size by 20%. It can also receive official service updates from Microsoft. This version does not come pre-installed with Edge browser and removes Xbox-related functions (which will be restored after downloading games from the Microsoft Store).

Readers can download tiny11 2311 from Internet Archive.
